attributes.action: Dissolve devolution in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details: The people’s of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland deserve better. The respective devolved administrations have failed the people they are supposed to serve. It is time to dissolve the devolved administrations.
attributes.background: Legislative devolution in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland has failed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The decision on whether or not the devolved administrations should be dissolved is a matter for people of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
